body: State who you think the arkham knight is, or comments about Batman Arkham Knight. I want to here what you all have to say about it.
body_tagged: State who you think the arkham knight is, or comments about Batman Arkham Knight. I want to here what you all have to say about it.
title: Arkham Knight

replies.body: I think that the Arkham Knight isn't going to be the Joker, because everybody's expecting that.  I feel like it's going to be a character that's not very well known in the series.
replies.body_tagged: I think that the Arkham Knight isn't going to be the Joker, because everybody's expecting that.  I feel like it's going to be a character that's not very well known in the series.

replies.body: Gonna be one of the little nise helpers in disguise
replies.body_tagged: Gonna be one of the little nise helpers in disguise
